extension_description.message: Select some text and it will be instantly copied to the clipboard! Paste it with one click!

trim_selection_option.message: Remove white spaces at the beginning and end of the selection:

copy_only_with_alt_option.message: Auto copy only when Alt key is pressed:

bypass_copy_in_input_fields_option.message: Bypass auto copy in input fields:

prepend_text_option.message: Add this text before the copied content:

postpend_text_option.message: Add this text after the copied content:

info_button_clean_field_popup.message: If you paste in a field that already contains some text, all text in the field will be deleted before pasting the new text.

bypass_copy_with_alt_option.message: Do not copy when Alt key is pressed:

include_url_option.message: Include URL of page in selection:
